data.text:
Heart of the Comet

Mar-1986

/ Science Fiction

From the fertile imaginations of two of science fiction's most formidable talents, nebula Award winners Gregory Benford and David Brin, comes a compelling and visionary novel of epic proportions...a story of drama and power, of deep human courage and...
